An amazing, horrifying world.

[h1]Игра-скриншот[/h1]

[u]Каждый момент хочется нажать ту самую кнопку[/u] 

Прежде чем писать обзор, хочу отметить, что BioShock Infinite очень красивая игра.
BioShock Infinite — компьютерная игра в жанре шутера от первого лица с элементами RPG, стимпанка и научной фантастики. Действие игры происходит в 1912 году в вымышленном летающем городе Колумбия. Главного героя зовут Букер ДеВитт. Он частный детектив и прибыл в Колумбию, чтобы найти девушку по имени Элизабет. Позже, они вместе окажутся в центре войны между рабочими и городскими властями. У Элизабет есть сверхспособность: создавать "разрывы" между параллельными мирами и благодаря этому, они многое узнают про этот город, а также про свое прошлое.
Саундтрек здесь прекрасный, чего только стоит музыка которая играет в меню! Большую часть игры нам придется расправляться со злодеями, в сопровождении очаровательной и очень красивой Элизабет. В игре прекрасная атмосфера. Локации разнообразны, декорации на протяжении всего прохождения будут постоянно изменяться, хочется просто бродить по городу, слушая диалоги прохожих и любоваться красотой, ведь перестрелки иногда надоедают. 
Подведем итоги: BioShock Infinite игра, с хорошим сюжетом, подбором персонажей, прекрасным саундтреком, отлично проработанными локациями. Рекомендую эту игру к прохождению, потому что каждый уважающий себя геймер обязан сыграть в BioShock Infinite!Думаю за 2013 год это лучшая игра,и если в 2020 или 21 году выйдет новая часть то она будет в много раз лучше...

想改评测了。
为啥？因为这游戏流程有点短，而且没有让我二周目的动力。
我承认，剧情很牛逼，时间线交错，人物的联系复杂。但玩法方面个人认为还是不够的。很多游戏二周目都能继承一周目的一些东西，而生化奇兵无限不能。
总而言之，我不后悔买了这款游戏，毕竟它的剧情令人惊叹。但是，我不推荐这个游戏～～

I hadn't played this for a while but I did play the other 2 Bioshock games ages ago, I found them to be pretty fun but nothing too amazing, the settings were also really cool. However I think I way prefer  BioShock Infinite, I think the characters were all really strong and had interesting dynamics and the story was subtle but always pressing on deep themes. The game was quite explicitly political in a far more overt way than Bioshock 1 & 2. 

Bioshock Infinite touched on racism, religion, and indoctrination and is a pretty bold and unabashed critique of United States politics and culture. The more sci-fi paradoxy aspect of the game touched on ideas of identity causation and responsibility in quite a thought-provoking way as well. I am normally not a fan of multiple-worlds/time-travelling in media but in this I think they were not pretentious about it and it totally fits with the aesthetic of the game. 

This was held together by a simple but decent gameplay experience with satisfying (to use and upgrade) weapons and powers that don't complicate the game too much to make you lose focus on what is happening with the characters. Also the game just looks beautiful and has incredible lighting. I found the climax to be super gripping and even a bit existentially terrifying. Great pacing of the story. 

I just wish they didn't put the auto-direction signal in, you can not press it but when you get a little lost it's always tempting. Without it the player is more inclined to focus on the environment instead of the arrow on the floor in front of them.

Hopefully I'll have the time to do at least another play through.

11/10, Sublime en todo aspecto

First off I am huge fan of the first Bioshock game, but went into this one knowing it was different than that. I have to say my only complaint, is that towards the middle of the game it felt grindy, just fighting the same type of enemies over and over, but the story more than makes up for that. The 1st Bioshock will always be my favorite, but I really enjoyed this one as well.

As the 2010's near their end, I can safely say that Bioshock Infinite is one of the best games of the last decade.

Bioshock Infinte has amazing visuals, amazing gameplay, and an amazong story told with very high production values. This game mixes excellent gameplay with one of the best stories ever told in a video game. In fact, I would say that Bioshock Infinite has one of the best stories I've seen in a work of fiction.

Games are art too, and Bioshock Infinite is living proof of that.
生化奇兵3 是当之无愧的神作！

Au niveau des graphismes dans l'ensemble, rien de fou mais ça reste très joli avec une direction artistique franchement inspirée qui me rappelle (un peu) Borderland, deux trois problèmes de texture, de clip et ce genre de truc mais ça va pas plus loin. Au niveau du gameplay, le feedback des armes défonce, c'est bourrin et quand même assez subtil pour pas être un juste un défouloir façon Doom je suis pas entrain de dire que Doom c'est pas subtil hein? juste que ç'est pas la même philosophie de gameplay). C'est un jeu ultra jouissif et défoulant mais en même temps c'est super touchant comme scénario (ça rappelle un peu the last of us dans la relation des deux protagonistes). Convient à ceux qui veulent fight avec des armes et des pouvoirs qui ont de la patate et ceux qui aiment bien se casser la tête sur des explication de scénar qui ne mène nul part (genre moi). 

Dans la droite lignée de ses prédécesseurs, c'est selon moi une bonne réinvention de la série et un excellent jeu. Bref ,ça tue.
Simplemente increíble, es la primera vez que escribo una reseña porque recién acabo de terminar el juego y quedé sin palabras.
Uno de los mejores juegos que jugué en mi vida, relación jugabilidad/historia, impresionante ambientación y desarrollo de personaje. Recomendadisimo (jugar la triología + dlc para más placer)

Bioshock Infinite is really quite a good game with a touchingly human story and great combat mechanics. Sure, It's not as groundbreaking as Bioshock but the game really keeps you invested in the story and characters. It is however the easiest Bioshock game 2K ever published. It's not much of a challenge in the normal mode and ammo and salts which are the bread and butter of this combat system are available quite easily, so no longer running to shops and hacking them when you are low on money. Enemies are bullet-sponges and lack the ferocity of the splicers in previous games. However shooting feels solid as ever. It is also the most linear Bioshock ever.  Also the most stable game, no bugs or crashes whatsoever in my playtime, which I encountered often in Bioshock and Bioshock 2.
One thing about the story that really left me unsatisfied is the arc Booker goes through. I really got invested in the stoic Pinkerton's man who is horribly broken from inside. His fate in the end is quite painful and unexpectedly harsh. But I get the point, tragic protagonists stay with you longer. It's a solid 7/10 in my book.

Oyunda 4 saat gibi az bir vakit oynadıktan sonra Dost Kayaoğlu'nun incelemesini izledim.Dost Kayaoğluyla ilk tanışmamdı.Şuanda bir çok videosunun sözlerini ezbere biliyorum.O bu oyunun sürekli tekrar ettiğini söylemişti ve bende bırakmıştım.Keşke bırakmasaymışım.Bu oyun hakkında belki çok bir fikrim yok ama beni Dost Kayaoğlu ile tanıştırdığı için bu oyunun yeri çok farklı.Teşekkürler Bioshock:İnfinite....

Totalmente recomendado, una de las mejores historias que he tenido el placer de disfrutar en un videojuego, lo habia pasado en su tiempo en la xbox360, y ahora con mas años encima volvi a jugarlo y acabo gustandome aun mas que la primer vez, inmejorable.
En gráficos obviamente se fue quedando atrás con el paso del tiempo pero sigue sin verse mal, la ia es bastante buena conforme vamos subiendo la dificultad y por último los controles son medio "torpes" hasta que te acostumbras.

Here's the thing, get the sniper rifle, get the volley gun, and you're set. No need for anything else.

Bioshock Infinite is my 2nd single player campaign FPS game I finish and all I can say that the game is really beautiful with an amazing atmosphere where there is a floating city in the sky now that's my type of place to be in tbh xD. The weapons and power ups really good where you can use different one of them each time in any situation or you can use whatever you like to use. The story is the really decent and sublime even if you're not a hardcore FPS gamer you will like Bioshock Infinite story for sure. Finally, Elizabeth is an amazing character with a really amazing traits and personality in the game and you will see why :) Bioshock Infinite 10/10

I don't even know where to start when describing this game. The gameplay is fantastic, the graphics are beautiful, and the story is amazing. One of the few games that I played through entirely in one sitting, even though that took sixteen hours. I was just so hooked on the story. I would highly recommend that everybody plays this game.
Damn good story.

Convoluted story in the extreme and unlike in previous Bioshock's where you could actually influence the story along the way, in this one, you couldn't, it has but one ending and dare I say, it is a really bad, BAD ending. Bad as in stupid, bad as in moronic, bad as in just plain idiotically bad. I don't like to insult people, but here, it is absolutely warranted. The people who wrote this, who approved this, are morons.

Помню, как играл впервые еще в год релиза, с тех пор вышла пара DLC. Тогда еще мне казалась странной концовка, но в принципе пойдет, но после допок готов жрать эту биошочную франшизу за обе щеки. Тот факт, что третью часть привязали к первым двум, греет душу. Люблю первые две части. Эту тоже, но здесь как-то без фанатизма. Нет того самого духа батьковства, хотя у гг есть дочь, и мы ее всю игру спасаем. Что-то пошло не так.
